net_enrollment_rate_pry.name: Net enrollment rate for primary education
net_enrollment_rate_pry.description: Number of official primary school aged children (6-11 year olds in Nigeria) enrolled in primary school expressed as a percent of the total children of the official school age population (6-11 year olds in Nigeria).

gross_enrollment_rate_pry.name: Gross enrollment rate in primary education
gross_enrollment_rate_pry.description: Total enrolment in primary school, regardless of age, expressed as a percentage of the eligible official primary school-age population (6-11 years of age in Nigeria) in a given school year.

girls_boys_ratio_js.name: Ratio of girls to boys in junior secondary schools
girls_boys_ratio_js.description: Ratio of the number of female students enrolled in junior secondary school to the number of male students enrolled in junior secondary school, regardless of ages.

nga_under5_mortality_rate.name: Under five mortality rate (per 1,000 live births)
nga_under5_mortality_rate.description: The likelihood of a child dying before reaching five years of age (expressed as number of deaths per 1,000 births)

nga_proportion_immunized_against_measles.name: Measles immunization rate
nga_proportion_immunized_against_measles.description: Percentage of one-year old children who received a measles vaccination

nga_proportion_u5_children_sleeping_unde.name: Proportion of children under five sleeping under insecticide-treated bednets
nga_proportion_u5_children_sleeping_unde.description: Percentage of children under five years of age who sleep under an insecticide-treated bednet

net_enrollment_rate_js.name: Net enrollment rate for junior secondary education
net_enrollment_rate_js.description: Number of official junior secondary school aged children (12-14 year olds in Nigeria) enrolled in junior secondary school expressed as a percent of the total children of the official school age population (12-14 year olds in Nigeria).

gross_enrollment_rate_js.name: Gross enrollment rate in junior secondary education
gross_enrollment_rate_js.description: Total enrolment in secondary school, regardless of age, expressed as a percentage of the eligible official secondary school-age population (12-17 years of age in Nigeria) in a given school year.

nga_pct_hholds_with_access_to_improved_w.name: Proportion of households with an improved water source
nga_pct_hholds_with_access_to_improved_w.description: Ratio of the number of people in urban and rural areas, who use piped water, public tap, borehole or pump, protected well, protected spring or rainwater to the total population, expressed as a percentage.

nga_pct_hholds_with_access_to_improved_s.name: Proportion of households with improved sanitation
nga_pct_hholds_with_access_to_improved_s.description: Percentage of people in urban or rural areas, out of the total urban or rural population, who have access to access to improved latrines that are not public or shared by many households.

proportion_delivery_24_7_sansHP.name: Percentage that provide delivery services for pregnant women
proportion_delivery_24_7_sansHP.description: Percentage that provide delivery services for pregnant women

proportion_vaccines_fridge_freezer_sansH.name: Percentage with refrigerator or freezer for vaccine storage
proportion_vaccines_fridge_freezer_sansH.description: Percentage with refrigerator or freezer for vaccine storage

num_nurses.name: Total number of nurses in the LGA

proportion_improved_water_supply.name: Percentage with functioning improved water point
proportion_improved_water_supply.description: Percentage with functioning improved water point

phcn_electricity.name: Percentage with connected to national electricity grid (PHCN)
phcn_electricity.description: Percentage with connected to national electricity grid (PHCN)

facilities_emergency_transport.name: Facilities with access to emergency transport
facilities_emergency_transport.description: Facilities with access to emergency transport

proportion_schools_gender_sep_toilet_jun.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with gender-separated toilets

proportion_classrooms_need_major_repair_.name: Percentage of junior secondary school classrooms needing major repair

tchr_pay_delay.name: Delayed teacher payments in the past 12 months
tchr_pay_delay.description: Teachers were not paid on time at least once in the last 12 months

net_enrollment_rate_girls_primary.name: Primary net enrollment rate (NER) for girls

net_enrollment_ratio_secondary_education.name: Net enrollment rate for secondary education
net_enrollment_ratio_secondary_education.description: Number of children of secondary school  going age who are enrolled in it, as a percentage of the official secondary going age population respectively

girl_boy_ratio_secondary_school.name: Ratio of girls to boys in senior secondary schools

gross_enrollment_ratio_secondary_educati.name: Gross enrollment rate for secondary education
gross_enrollment_ratio_secondary_educati.description: Total enrollment in secondary school, regardless of age, expressed as a percentage of the eligible official secondary school-age population

compr_oc_blood_transfusions.name: Blood Transfusion
compr_oc_blood_transfusions.description: Facility has the capacity to perform safe blood transfusion.

proportion_access_functional_emergency_t.name: Percentage of facilities with access to emergency transport services

proportion_of_births_by_skilled_health_p.name: Proportion of births attended by skilled health personnel

percent_management_public.name: Percentage that are managed by the government

percent_teachers_nce_primary.name: Percentage of teachers with NCE qualification

percent_management_public_primary.name: Percentage that are managed by the government

avg_num_students_primary.name: Average number of students enrolled per school

avg_num_tchrs_primary.name: Average number of teachers per school

avg_num_classrms_primary.name: Average number of classrooms per school

avg_num_toilets_primary.name: Average number of toilets per school

percent_management_public_js.name: Percentage that are managed by the government

avg_num_students_js.name: Average number of students enrolled per school

avg_num_tchrs_js.name: Average number of teachers per school

avg_num_classrms_js.name: Average number of classrooms per school

avg_num_toilets_js.name: Average number of toilets per school

percent_phcn_electricity_primary.name: Percentage with access to the national grid (PHCN)

percent_phcn_electricity_js.name: Percentage with access to the national grid (PHCN)

num_school_1kmplus_secondary_school.name: Number of primary schools within 1 km of nearest junior secondary school

num_hospitals.name: Total number of hospitals in LGA

num_health_facilities_sansHP.name: Total number of primary health clinics, primary health centers, comprehensive health centers and hospitals

proportion_power_alternative_functional.name: Percentage with alternative source of electricity/power

multigrade_classrms.name: Multi-grade classrooms
multigrade_classrms.description: The school has classrooms that are used for more than one class on a regular basis.

facility_open_247_yn.name: 24/7 Curative Care
facility_open_247_yn.description: Facility offers curative care 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

proportion_schools_fence_good_cond_prima.name: Percentage of primary schools with a wall/fence in good condition

proportion_provide_pens_pencils_juniorse.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools where pens/pencils are provided to students

proportion_provide_exercise_books.name: Proportion of schools that provide exercise books to students

primary_school_pupil_teachers_ratio_lga.name: Primary school pupil to teacher ratio

num_lab_techs.name: Total number of laboratory technicians in the LGA

proportion_classrooms_need_minor_repair_.name: Percentage of primary school classrooms needing minor repair

potable_water_access.name: Potable water
potable_water_access.description: Facility has access to potable water source that is currently functional.

proportion_teachers_with_teacher_guide_p.name: Percentage of primary schools where each teacher has a teaching guidebook for every subject

proportion_offer_bednets.name: Percentage of facilities that provide bednets

proportion_schools_with_clinic_dispensar.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with a dispensary/health clinic

proportion_teachers_nce_juniorsec.name: Percentage of junior secondary qualified teachers (with NCE)

prevalence_of_underweight_children_u5.name: Percentage of children under five who are underweight (weight-for-age)
prevalence_of_underweight_children_u5.description: Percentage of children under five whose weight-for-age is below minus two standard deviations (-2 SD) from the median of the reference population (all children under 5)

proportion_provide_exercise_books_primar.name: Percentage of primary schools where exercise books are provided to students

proportion_schools_functioning_library_j.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with a functioning library

proportion_schools_gender_sep_toilet.name: Proportion of schools with gender-separated toilet(s)

proportion_teachers_with_teacher_guide_j.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools where each teacher has a teaching guidebook for every subject

num_lab_techs_fulltime.name: Lab technicians
num_lab_techs_fulltime.description: Number of full-time lab technicians on staff at the facility.

num_nurses_fulltime.name: Nurses
num_nurses_fulltime.description: Number of full-time nurses on staff at the facility.

proportion_schools_chalkboard_all_rooms_.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with a chalkboard in every classroom

proportion_students_3kmplus_primary.name: Percentage of primary schools with students living farther than 3km

net_enrollment_ratio_primary_education.name: Net enrollment rate for primary education
net_enrollment_ratio_primary_education.description:
Number of children of primary school  
going age who are enrolled in it, as a percentage of the official primary school going age population respectively

immunization_rate_dpt3.name: DPT 3 immunization rate
immunization_rate_dpt3.description: Percentage of children aged 12-23 months who received DPT3 immunization any time before the survey

distribution_type.name: Distribution Type
distribution_type.description: The distribution type refers to whether this water source is distributed at a single point, or multiple points. For multiple point distributions, the type also classifies whether the water points served by the water source are roughly within 100 meters, within 1000 meters (1 km), or beyond 1 kilometer.

proportion_schools_delay_pay.name: Proportion of schools with teacher pay delay in past 12 months

ward.name: Ward
ward.description: The ward this facility is in.

proportion_antenatal.name: Percentage of facilities that offer antenatal care

proportion_family_planning.name: Percentage of facilities that offer family planning services

proportion_schools_missed_pay_primary.name: Percentage of primary schools that have missed teacher payments in the past 12 months

prevalence_of_stunting_children_u5.name: Percentage of children under five with stunting (height-for-age)
prevalence_of_stunting_children_u5.description: Percentage of children under five whose height-for-age is below minus two standard deviations (-2 SD) from the median of the reference population

proportion_water_poor_water_quality.name: Proportion of water sources that are not used because of bad water quality

sterilization_yn_calc.name: Permanent methods
sterilization_yn_calc.description: Facility offers permanent contraceptive methods (i.e., tubal ligation, vasectomy).

proportion_natl_curriculum_juniorsec.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools that follow the National UBE Curriculum

functioning_library_yn.name: Functioning Library
functioning_library_yn.description: The school has a room or building that houses books and other materials students and staff can access.

num_classrms_total.name: Classroom(s) that need major repairs
num_classrms_total.description: Number of classrooms at the school.

num_classrms_need_maj_repairs.name: Classroom(s) that need major repairs
num_classrms_need_maj_repairs.description: Number of classrooms at the school that are in need of major repair.

staff_paid_lastmth_yn.name: Salaried staff paid during last period
staff_paid_lastmth_yn.description: Salary staff at the facility were paid their salaries during the last payment/financial period before data was collected.

paid_services_malaria_treatment.name: No user fees for malaria treatment
paid_services_malaria_treatment.description: Facility does not charge any user fees for malaria treatment

mortality_rate_infant.name: Infant Mortality Rate (per 1,000 live births)
mortality_rate_infant.description: Proportion of children out of 1000 live births who would die before reach 1 years of age

teacher_guide_yn.name: Teaching guidebook for every teacher for every subject
teacher_guide_yn.description: Teachers at the school have a Ministry of Education issued/approved teacher's guide or syllabus for all subjects

family_planning_iud_calc.name: IUD
family_planning_iud_calc.description: Facility has intrauterine devices for long-term contraception available.

proportion_schools_gender_sep_toilet_pri.name: Percentage of primary schools with gender-separated toilets

proportion_schools_covered_roof_good_con.name: Proportion of schools with a roof in good condition

proportion_of_children_u5_diarrhea_treat.name: Percentage of children under five years of age with diarrhea who received oral rehydration therapy
proportion_of_children_u5_diarrhea_treat.description: Percentage of Children under 5 years old who had diarrhea in the last two weeks who were treated with ORS or RHS

proportion_schools_missed_pay_juniorsec.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools that have missed teacher payments in the past 12 months

proportion_health_facilities_open_24_7.name: Percentage of facilities that offer care 24 hours a day, 7 days a week

proportion_teachers_training_last_year_p.name: Percentage of primary school teachers who participated in training in the past 12 months

proportion_schools_with_first_aid_kit_ju.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with a first aid kit only (not a health clinic)

transition_rate_primary_to_js1_female.name: Transition rate (primary to junior secondary) for girls

avg_equip_supplies_rating.name: Average performance related to equipment and supplies

sulpha_and_antenatal.name: SP (IPT for Malaria)
sulpha_and_antenatal.description: Facility provides antenatal care including sulphadoxine pyrimethamine (SP or fansidar) for the prevention of malaria during pregancy.

proportion_schools_covered_roof_good_con.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with a roof in good condition

lab_tests_tb_microscopy_calc.name: TB testing
lab_tests_tb_microscopy_calc.description: Facility offers testing of tuberculosis with microscopy.

pupil_classrm_ratio.name: Pupil to classroom ratio
pupil_classrm_ratio.description: This is the ratio of the number of students at the school to the number of classrooms available.

n/a.name: Adequate Staffing
n/a.description: The facility's staffing meets Nigerian minimum standards for a facility of its type.

gender_parity_index_js.name: Gender parity index (GPI) for junior secondary schools

class_held_outside.name: Teach outside because there are not enough classrooms
class_held_outside.description: The school does not have enough classrooms and as a result some classes are held outside.

percentage_functional_improved.name: Percentage of improved water points that are functional

teacher_nonteachingstaff_ratio_lga_junio.name: Junior secondary teaching to non-teaching staff ratio

health_no_user_fees.name: User fees
health_no_user_fees.description: Facility charges fees for health services.

improved_sanitation.name: Improved sanitation
improved_sanitation.description: Facility has at least one improved toilet

proportion_schools_improved_sanitation_p.name: Percentage of primary schools with improved sanitation/toilet

school_1kmplus_catchment_area.name: Farther than 1km from catchment area
school_1kmplus_catchment_area.description: The school is more than 1 km from the catchment area/areas it is supposed to serve. This indicator measures how easily students can access a school.

proportion_schools_two_shifts_juniorsec.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with double shifts

hiv_tx_srvcs_pmtct_services_calc.name: PMTCT Services
hiv_tx_srvcs_pmtct_services_calc.description: Facility offers prevention of mother-to-child transmission of HIV services.

proportion_provide_pens_pencils_primary.name: Percentage of primary schools where pens/pencils are provided to students

proportion_provide_exercise_books_junior.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools where exercise books are provided to students

proportion_at_least_1_chew.name: Proportion of facilities that have at least one CHEW (Jr or Sr)

proportion_water_access.name: Proportion of facilities that have access to an improved water source

junior_secondary_school_pupil_teachers_r.name: Junior secondary school pupil to teacher ratio

teacher_nonteachingstaff_ratio_lga_prima.name: Primary school teaching to non-teaching staff ratio

proportion_improved_sanitation.name: Percentage of facilities with functioning improved sanitation

proportion_health_facilities_tb_treatmen.name: Percentage of facilities that offer TB testing

primary_nir_girl.name: Primary net intake rate (NIR) for girls

proportion_schools_with_clinic_dispensar.name: Proportion of schools with health clinic

primary_nir_boy.name: Primary net intake rate (NIR) for boys

pupil_desk_ratio.name: Pupil to desk ratio
pupil_desk_ratio.description: This is the ratio of the number of students at the school to the number of desks avaiable

num_nursemidwives_fulltime.name: Midwives and Nurse-midwives
num_nursemidwives_fulltime.description: Number of full-time midwives and nurse-midwives on staff at the facility.

proportion_schools_power_access.name: Proportion of schools with access to power source

num_primary_schools_govt_and_private.name: Number of primary schools (Government and Private) (LGA)
num_primary_schools_govt_and_private.description: Number of existing public and private primary schools in the LGA

proportion_schools_hold_classes_outside_.name: Percentage of primary schools that teach outside because there are not enough classrooms

proportion_deworming.name: Percentage of facilities that offer  deworming

percentage_households_with_access_to_imp.name: Percentage households with access to improved sanitation
percentage_households_with_access_to_imp.description: Number of households with access to improved sanitation/ Total number of households

access_first_aid.name: First-aid kit only (no health clinic)
access_first_aid.description: The school has a first aid kit that can be used for students and staff.  The aim behind this indicator is to find out whether the school is is prepared to manage very basic injuries that happen to students or staff. A school is counted as having a first aid kit if the respondnet explicitly said there is a first aid kit for students and staff. The school does not have a health clinic but just a first aid kit.

immunization_rate_measles.name: Infant mortality rate (per 1,000 live births)
immunization_rate_measles.description: Percentage of children aged 12-23 months who received measles immunization any time before the survey

lift_mechanism.name: Lift Mechanism
lift_mechanism.description: The primary/main lift mechanism for the water source. A lift mechanism is the way water is brought to the surface for people to use and can include a variety of methods, such as diesel pumps, hand pumps, animal powered pumps etc.

proportion_schools_1kmplus_catchment_jun.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools farther than 1km from catchement area

proportion_schools_chalkboard_all_rooms_.name: Percentage of primary schools with a chalkboard in every classroom

literacy_rate.name: Literacy rate of 15-24 year olds (men and women)
literacy_rate.description: Proportion of individuals aged 15 and over  who were unable to read a simple letter either in their local language or in English and were unable to write a letter in their local, language or in English from  the total population greater than 15 years . It could also be calculated as 100-%literacy rate

proportion_schools_two_shifts.name: Proportion of schools with double shift arrangement

proportion_delivery_no_user_fees.name: Percentage of facilities that do not charge any fees for maternal health servi

proportion_no_user_fees_malaria.name: Percentage of facilities that do not charge fees for malaria-related services

gross_enrollment_rate_primary.name: Gross enrollment rate in primary education

tchr_pay_miss.name: Missed teacher payments in the past 12 months
tchr_pay_miss.description: Teachers were not paid at all at least once in the last 12 months

students_living_3kmplus_school.name: More than 20% students living farther than 3km from school
students_living_3kmplus_school.description: The school has>20% students who live more than 3kms away. This indicator measures how easily students can access a school. The assumption is that students are more likely to attend school if they do not live very far away from the school or if the school is within a reasonable distance from where the population it serves live.

percentage_functional_taps.name: Percentage of taps that are functional

two_shifts_yn.name: Double shifts
two_shifts_yn.description: The school teaches in shifts throughout the day. If the school operates in a single shift, only one group of students is being taught during the day. If another group of students comes after the first group has finished and uses the same classrooms and facilities, the school operates in double shifts.  Schools can have morning and afternoon shifts or they can have shifts that overlap.

proportion_schools_power_access_juniorse.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with access to power

proportion_water_dry_well.name: Proportion of water sources that are not used because of dry well

proportion_schools_delay_pay_juniorsec.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools that have delayed teacher payments in the past 12 months

pupil_bench_ratio.name: Pupil to bench ratio
pupil_bench_ratio.description: This is the ratio of the number of students at the school to the number of benches available at the school.

improved_sanitation_and_functional.name: Toilets/latrines
improved_sanitation_and_functional.description: Facility had access to toilets/latrines for at least three weeks in the month prior to data collection.

family_planning_injectables_calc_calc.name: Injectables
family_planning_injectables_calc_calc.description: Facility has injectable contraceptive methods available.

proportion_schools_hold_classes_outside_.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools that teach outside because there are not enough classrooms

proportion_water_no_electricity.name: Proportion of water sources that are not used because of no electric power

proportion_health_facilities_routine_imm.name: Percentage of facilities that offer routine immunization

junior_nir_boy.name: Junior secondary net intake rate (NIR) for boys

mobile_signal_funct_yn.name: Mobile Coverage
mobile_signal_funct_yn.description: Facility has a currently functioning mobile coverage on the premises.

family_planning_pill_calc_calc.name: Oral contraceptives
family_planning_pill_calc_calc.description: Facility has oral contraceptive pills available.

proportion_water_broken_other.name: Proportion of water sources that are not used because of other reasons

proportion_schools_missed_pay.name: Proportion of schools with teacher pay miss in past 12 months

compr_oc_c_sections.name: Cesarian section
compr_oc_c_sections.description: Facility has the capacity to perform c-section.

proportion_schools_improved_sanitation_j.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with improved sanitation/toilet

proportion_health_facilities_hiv_testing.name: Percentage of facilities that offer HIV testing

essential_meds_stockout.name: Drug Stock Outs
essential_meds_stockout.description: Facility has had a stockout of essental medications (antimalarials, antidiarrheals or antibiotics) for at least one week in the month prior to data collection.

access_clinic_dispensary.name: Dispensary / Health Clinic
access_clinic_dispensary.description: The school has a health clinic for students and staff. The aim behind this indicator is to find out whether the school is prepared to manage very basic injuries that happen to students or staff. A school is counted as having a health clinic if the respondnet explicitly said there is a health clinic for students and staff.

proportion_schools_1kmplus_catchment_pri.name: Percentage of primary schools farther than 1km from catchement area

junior_nir_girl.name: Junior Secondary net intake rate (NIR) for girls

natl_curriculum_yn.name: Follow the national UBE curriculum
natl_curriculum_yn.description: The school uses the Ministry of Education issued/approved curriculum for all subjects

education_type.name: Education type
education_type.description: The type of curriculum taught at this school

num_students_total.name: Students
num_students_total.description: Total number of students in this school

emergency_transport.name: Emergency Transport
emergency_transport.description: Facility has access to emergency transport vehicle

vaccines_fridge_freezer.name: Vaccine Fridge or Freezer
vaccines_fridge_freezer.description: Facility has access to a vaccine fridge or a vaccine freezer.

proportion_schools_multigrade_classrooms.name: Proportion of schools with multigrade classroom(s)

num_chews_total.name: CHEWs and JCHEWs
num_chews_total.description: Number of full-time community health extension workers (CHEWs) and junior community health extension workers (JCHEWs) on staff at the facility.

at_least_three_skilled_birth_attendants.name: Skilled birth attendant 3
at_least_three_skilled_birth_attendants.description: Facility has at least three skilled birth attendants (doctor, midwife or nurse-midwife) on staff.

percent_antenatal_care_four.name: Percentage of women who attended at least four antenatal visits

proportion_adequate_staff.name: Proportion of facilities that were adequately staffed in the past month

hiv_treatment_yn.name: ARV Treatment
hiv_treatment_yn.description: Facility offers anti-retroviral (ARV) drugs to treat HIV/AIDS.

pay_for_water_yn.name: Fees for use
pay_for_water_yn.description: The water source requires payment in order for someone to use/draw water.

proportion_schools_functioning_library.name: Proportion of schools with a functioning library

proportion_health_facilities_tb_testing.name: Percentage of facilities that offer TB testing

net_enrollment_rate_girls_js.name: Junior secondary net enrollment rate (NER) for girls

proportion_water_broken_lift.name: Proportion of water sources that are not used because of broken lift

proportion_schools_power_access_primary.name: Percentage of primary schools with access to power

proportion_schools_fence_good_cond_junio.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with a wall/fence in good condition

proportion_provide_pens_pencils.name: Proportion of schools that provide pens/pencils to students

proportion_malaria_prevention_pregnancy.name: Percentage of facilities that offer malaria prophylaxis during pregnancy

proportion_children_u5_sleeping_under_it.name: Percentage of children under five sleeping under insecticide-treated bednets
proportion_children_u5_sleeping_under_it.description: Percentage of children under 5  who slept under insecticide-treated bednets the night before the survey

proportion_schools_functioning_library_p.name: Percentage of primary schools with a functioning library

child_health_growth_monitor.name: Growth monitoring
child_health_growth_monitor.description: Facility offers growth monitoring of children.

proportion_schools_with_first_aid.name: Proportion of schools with first aid kit

community.name: Community
community.description: The community this facility is in.

equipment_bp_machine.name: BP machine
equipment_bp_machine.description: Facility has a blood pressure (BP) machine.

proportion_health_facilities_art_treatme.name: Percentage of facilities that offer ART treatment

net_enrollment_rate_boys_js.name: Junior secondary net enrollment rate (NER) for boys

net_enrollment_rate_boys_primary.name: Primary net enrollment rate (NER) for boys

wall_fence_good_condi.name: Wall/fence in good condition
wall_fence_good_condi.description: The school's boundary wall or fence or some other demarcation of the school area is in good condition. Assessment of the condition of the  school's fences/boundary walls condition is not based on a measurement but on the respondent's knowledge of and subjective judgement of the fence/wall condition.

equipment_refrigerator.name: Refrigerator
equipment_refrigerator.description: Faciilty has a refrigerator for cold storage.

number_classrooms_need_minor_repair.name: Total nuber of classrooms that need minor repair in the LGA

num_chews.name: Total number of CHEWs (Jr. and Sr.) in the LGA

proportion_schools_improved_sanitation.name: Proportion of schools with improved sanitation/toilet

num_doctors_fulltime.name: Doctors
num_doctors_fulltime.description: Number of full-time doctors on staff at the facility.

percentage_households_with_access_to_imp.name: Percentage households with access to improved water sources
percentage_households_with_access_to_imp.description: Number of households with access to improved water sourcs/ Total number of households

education_improved_sanitation.name: Access to improved sanitation/toilet
education_improved_sanitation.description: School had access to improved sanitation/toilets for at least three weeks in the month before data was collected. It is assumed that improved sanitation reduces the risk of contact with waste and thus leads to a reduction in certain diseases. Improved sanitation is defined as sewers or septic tanks, poor-flush latrines and simple pit or ventilated improved pit latrines that are not for public use and are meant for use by staff and students.

lab_tests_hemoglobin_testing_calc.name: Hemoglobin
lab_tests_hemoglobin_testing_calc.description: Facility can perform measurement of a patient's hemoglobin.

water_source_type.name: Type
water_source_type.description: The type/kind of water source, such as borehole, protected dug well, developed/protected spring water, or a rainwater harvesting scheme.

girl_boy_ratio_primary.name: Ratio of girls to boys in primary schools

proportion_teachers_with_teacher_guide.name: Proportion of schools that has teacher guidebook for every subject

proportion_schools_improved_water_supply.name: Percentage of primary schools with access to potable water

vaccines_icepack_calc.name: Ice pack
vaccines_icepack_calc.description: Facility has ice packs for cold storage.

proportion_water_broken_pump.name: Proportion of water sources that are not used because of broken pump

pupil_toilet_ratio_facility.name: Pupil to toilet ratio
pupil_toilet_ratio_facility.description: This is the proportion of students to toilets at each school.

teacher_nonteachingstaff_ratio.name: Teacher to non-teaching staff
teacher_nonteachingstaff_ratio.description: This is the ratio of staff at the school who teach (teachers who are in permanent or temporary/part-time positions and both qualified and unqualified teachers) and do not teach (non-teaching staff are the number of male and female staff who do not teach and are classified as pay scale grade 7 and up).

proportion_water_other_close_water_sourc.name: Proportion of water sources with another close water source within 1km

proportion_any_power_access.name: Percentage of facilities with access to some form of power source

proportion_students_3kmplus_juniorsec.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with students living farther than 3km

comprehensive_obstetrics_yn.name: Comprehensive EmOC
comprehensive_obstetrics_yn.description: Facility offers comprehensive  emergency obstetric care, including C-sections.

num_tchrs_with_nce.name: Qualified teachers (with NCE)
num_tchrs_with_nce.description: This is the number of teachers at the school who have an NCE

proportion_water_no_diesel.name: Proportion of water sources that are not used because of no diesel

proportion_no_user_fees_child_health.name: Percentage of facilities that do not charge any fees for child health services

proportion_staff_paid.name: Percentage of facilities where all salaried staff were paid during the last pay period

proportion_water_under_construction.name: Proportion of water sources that are not used because of construction

power_access_and_functional.name: Power
power_access_and_functional.description: Facility has access to a power source that is currently functional.

breakdown.name: Reason Broken
breakdown.description: This is the reason that the water source is not functional.

percentage_of_individuals_tested_for_hiv.name: Percentage of men and women ever tested for HIV
percentage_of_individuals_tested_for_hiv.description: Percentage of women aged 15-49 years old who have ever been tested for HIV

malaria_treatment_artemisinin.name: ACT
malaria_treatment_artemisinin.description: Facility has artemisinin-based combination therapy (ACT) available.

proportion_malaria_treatment.name: Proportion of facilities that offer  malaria treatment

proportion_schools_delay_pay_primary.name: Percentage of primary schools that have delayed teacher payments in the past 12 months

is_improved.name: Improved
is_improved.description: The water source can be either improved, or unimproved.

proportion_improved_water_supply.name: Percentage of facilities with access to an improved water source

improved_water_supply.name: Improved water supply
improved_water_supply.description: Facility has access to an improved water source

malaria_treatment_sulphadoxine.name: Malaria prevention during pregnancy
malaria_treatment_sulphadoxine.description: Facility has available sulphadoxine pyrimethamine (SP or fansidar) for prevention of malaria during pregancy.

uterotonics_yn_calc.name: Uterotonics
uterotonics_yn_calc.description: Facility has IV or IM uterotonics.

proportion_water_broken_dont_know.name: Proportion of water sources that are not used because of an unknown reason

proportion_schools_chalkboard_all_rooms.name: Proportion of schools with a chalkboard in every classroom

male_to_female_student_ratio.name: Ratio boys to girls
male_to_female_student_ratio.description: The ratio of boys to girls enrolled at the school. The indicator is a ratio of the number of  enrolled boys to enrolled girls, regardless of ages. It measures the equality of educational opportunity, measured in terms of school enrolment, for boys and girls

prevalence_of_wasting_children_u5.name: Percentage of children under five with wasting (weight-for-height)
prevalence_of_wasting_children_u5.description: Percentage of children whose weight-for-height is below minus two standard deviations (-2 SD) from the median of the reference population

emergency_transport_currently_functionin.name: Access to Emergency Transport
emergency_transport_currently_functionin.description: Facility has access to emergency transport that is currently functional.

proportion_at_least_1_sba.name: Percentage of facilities with at least one skilled birth attendant

proportion_water_missing_or_stolen_parts.name: Proportion of water sources that are not used because of missing parts

proportion_natl_curriculum_primary.name: Percentage of primary schools that follow the National UBE Curriculum

power_access.name: Access to power
power_access.description: School had power for at least three weeks in the month before the data was collected. Access to power is defined as having power for at least three weeks in the month before the data was collected. This indicator measures how consistent and reliable the school's power source is.   If there was always at least one working power source in the month before data collection and if the school had power for 5 or more hours a day then the school is considered as having reliable and consistent power.

at_least_four_skilled_birth_attendants.name: Skilled birth attendant 4
at_least_four_skilled_birth_attendants.description: Facility has at least four skilled birth attendants (doctor, midwife or nurse-midwife) on staff.

potable_water.name: Access to potable water
potable_water.description:
School had potable water, without interruption, for at least three weeks in the past month. The indicator monitors access to safe water sources based on the assumption that
such sources are more likely to provide safe water and reduce the incidence of diseases caused by drinking/using unsafe water.

number_classrooms_need_major_repair.name: Total number of classrooms that need major repair in the LGA

proportion_health_facilities_inpatient_c.name: Percentage of facilities that offer inpatient care

num_tchrs_total.name: Total number of teachers
num_tchrs_total.description: This is the total number of teachers in each school.

malaria_testing.name: Malaria testing (microscopy or RDT)
malaria_testing.description: Facility offers either malaria rapid diagnostic test (RDT) or malaria microscopy.

covered_roof_good_condi.name: Roof in good condition
covered_roof_good_condi.description: School buildings have rooves that are described as being in good condition. Assessment of the school buildings rooves' condition is not based on a measurement but on the respondent's knowledge of and subjective judgement of the rooves condition.

proportion_schools_multigrade_classrooms.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with multi-grade classrooms

proportion_schools_potable_water.name: Proportion of schools with access to potable water

proportion_schools_covered_roof_good_con.name: Percentage of primary schools with a roof in good condition

proportion_schools_with_clinic_dispensar.name: Percentage of primary schools with a dispensary/health clinic

proportion_schools_multigrade_classrooms.name: Percentage of primary schools with multi-grade classrooms

proportion_teachers_training_last_year_j.name: Percentage of junior secondary school teachers who participated in training in the past 12 months

proportion_delivery_24_7.name: Percentage of facilities that offer delivery services 24 hours a day, 7 days a week

maternal_health_delivery_services_24_7.name: Delivery Services 24/7
maternal_health_delivery_services_24_7.description: Facility can perform deliveries 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

gender_parity_index_primary.name: Gender parity index (GPI) for primary schools

proportion_teachers_nce_primary.name: Percentage of primary school qualified teachers (with NCE)

transition_rate_primary_to_js1_male.name: Transition rate (primary to junior secondary) for boys

functional.name: Functional
functional.description: The water source can be either functional, or not functional.

proportion_schools_fence_good_cond.name: Proportion of schools with wall/fence in good condition

mortality_rate_children_u5.name: Under five mortality rate (per 1,000 live births)
mortality_rate_children_u5.description: Proportion of children out of 1000 live births who would die before reach 5 years of age

proportion_natl_curriculum.name: Proportion of schools that has national UBE curriculum

proportion_water_broken_tap.name: Proportion of water sources that are not used because of broken tap

girl_boy_ratio_js.name: Ratio of girls to boys in junior secondary schools

at_least_two_skilled_birth_attendants.name: Skilled birth attendant 2
at_least_two_skilled_birth_attendants.description: Facility has at least two skilled birth attendants (doctor, midwife or nurse-midwife) on staff.

proportion_schools_improved_water_supply.name: Percentage of junior secondary schools with access to potable water

chalkboard_each_classroom_yn.name: Chalkboards in every classroom
chalkboard_each_classroom_yn.description: Every classroom at the school has a chalkboard

num_tchrs_attended_training.name: Teachers who participated in training in the past 12 months
num_tchrs_attended_training.description: This is the  number of teachers at the school who attended a training or were sent for training in the past 12 months

proportion_stockout_essential_meds.name: Percentage of facilities that experienced a stock-out of essential medications in the past month

proportion_growth_monitoring.name: Percentage of facilities that offer growth monitoring

skilled_birth_attendant.name: Skilled birth attendant 1
skilled_birth_attendant.description: Facility has at least one skilled birth attendant (doctor, midwife or nurse-midwife) on staff.

proportion_schools_1kmplus_catchment.name: Proportion of schools farther than 1km from catchment area

proportion_schools_two_shifts_primary.name: Percentage of primary schools with double shifts

gender_separated_toilets_yn.name: Gender-separated toilet(s)
gender_separated_toilets_yn.description: School has separate toilets for boys and girls. Gender separated toilets are defined as those that are only for women or girls and other facilities only for men or boys. If  toilets are shared and are for use by women, girls, men and boys then the school does not have gender separated toilets.

proportion_health_facilities_med_waste_s.name: Percentage of facilities that separate medical waste from other forms of waste

textbook_to_pupil_ratio.name: Textbook to pupil ratio
textbook_to_pupil_ratio.description: This is the ratio of the number of textbooks at the schools to the number of textbooks.

proportion_classrooms_need_minor_repair_.name: Percentage of junior secondary school classrooms needing minor repair

proportion_malaria_testing.name: Percentage of facilities that offer malaria testing (RDT or microscopy)

proportion_act_treatment_for_malaria.name: Percentage of facilities that offer ACT-based treatment for malaria

provide_exercise_books_yn.name: Exercise books provided
provide_exercise_books_yn.description: The school gives its students exercise books

percentage_pregnant_women_tested_for_hiv.name: Percentage of pregnant women tested for HIV
percentage_pregnant_women_tested_for_hiv.description: Percentage of women between 15-49 years who were preganant in the last 5 years who got tested for HIV as a part of antenatal visit

school_1kmplus_secondary_school.name: Farther than 1km from nearest secondary school
school_1kmplus_secondary_school.description: The primary school is more than 1 km from the nearest secondary school. This indicator measures how easily students can access secondary education. The assumption is that students are more likely to attend secondary schools if they are easily accessible and are not located very far away from where the primary school or catchment area is.

num_nursemidwives_midwives.name: Total number of midwives and nurse-midwives in the LGA

lab_tests_stool_calc.name: Stool testing
lab_tests_stool_calc.description: Facility offers laboratory testing of stool.

pupil_tchr_ratio.name: Proportion of children who can do basic numeracy (TBD)
pupil_tchr_ratio.description: This is the proportion of children at the school who demonstrate  adequate ability to perform and understand basic maths.

proportion_emoc.name: Proportion of facilities that offer EmOC services

proportion_mobile_coverage.name: Percentage of facilities with mobile phone coverage somewhere on the premises

num_doctors.name: Total number of doctors in the LGA

num_classrms_need_min_repairs.name: Classroom(s) that need minor repairs
num_classrms_need_min_repairs.description: Number of classrooms at the school that are in need of only minor repairs

num_chews_and_chos.name: CHOs, CHEWs and JCHEWs
num_chews_and_chos.description: Number of full-time community health officers (CHOs), community health extension workers (CHEWs) and junior community health extension workers (JCHEWs) on staff at the facility.

has_itns.name: Insecticide Treated Nets
has_itns.description: Facility has insecticide treated bednets (ITNs) available.

provide_pens_yn.name: Pens/pencils provided
provide_pens_yn.description: The school gives its students pens and pencils

proportion_classrooms_need_major_repair_.name: Percentage of primary school classrooms needing major repair

proportion_schools_1kmplus_ss.name: Proportion of schools farther than 1km from its nearest secondary school

proportion_schools_with_first_aid_kit_pr.name: Percentage of primary schools with a first aid kit only (not a health clinic)

proportion_teachers_nce.name: Percentage of teachers with NCE qualification
